content: Hello! Thanks for reaching XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Do you need assistance with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Um, hi, yeah, I think, yeah, I need a plumber. My sink is like... leaking everywhere? I guess.
I'm sorry to hear about your sink! I can help you get a plumber scheduled. May I have your name, please?
Uh, it's Mike. Mike Johnson. Sorry, I'm at work so kinda, uh, distracted.
Thank you, Mike! Could you please provide the address where you'd like the plumbing service?
Sure, it's 4830 Willow Park uh... wait, Willow Park Drive, I think. Yeah, 4830 Willow Park Dr.
Thanks, Mike! One moment while I check if we serve your address.
I'm having trouble verifying your address. Could you please double-check and confirm your full address, including any apartment or unit number if applicable? This will help us serve you better.
Oh man, uh, there's no apartment, it's just my house. 4830 Willow Park Dr, uh, in Kentwood. Zip is, hang on—49508 I think?
Thank you for the details! Let me try again to confirm your location.

I'm sorry, I'm still having trouble confirming your address in our service system. Can you confirm if your city is Kentwood, Michigan, and if there are any other location details you can provide? Or, if you prefer, I can connect you with a human representative for further assistance.
Yeah, Kentwood MI, 4830 Willow Park Dr, that's, uh, all of it. Uh, should I call instead?

Thank you for confirming! I'm still unable to verify your address with our automated system. I recommend connecting you with a human representative who can help you further and ensure we get your appointment scheduled correctly. Is that okay?
Hi Mike, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. We'll help you get a plumber out to 4830 Willow Park Dr, Kentwood, MI 49508. When would be the best time for a technician to come by?
Anytime today, as soon as possible please. It’s still leaking.
Thank you, Mike! We'll get someone dispatched to your address this afternoon. You’ll get a confirmation text once the booking is finalized. If anything changes, just reply to this message.
